document_data.name: Oni
document_data.mainbody: '''Oni''' ({{Pronounce|oh|nee|refs=}}) were violent [[spirit]] creatures with great strength and inherent magical abilities, prevalent in the eastern lands of [[Kara-Tur]].

Subraces.[[Common oni]]: The most common and weakest variety. The "[[ogre mage]]" of the west was in fact a blue-skinned variety of the common oni.
Subraces.[[Go-zu oni]]: This was a bull-headed variety of oni.
Subraces.[[Me-zu oni]]: These oni had heads like those of shaggy horses.

document_data.Personality:
Oni enjoyed both dancing and music. They particularly enjoyed the music of flutes. It was considered unwise to interrupt an oni dancing celebration!

Among animals, oni preferred black-colored ones.

Oni also were very fond of treasures of all varieties. Some oni would swallow their treasures to protect them, regurgitating them later.

Society.Language: Oni had their [[Oni language|own language]], but spoke other languages as well.

document_data.Ecology:
Oni were carnivorous and had massive appetites. They ate both wild game and domesticated animals, and would eat humanoids as well.

Males and females were equally powerful.
document_data.History: The origin of oni remained a mystery to scholars. Many believed that they were the corrupted spirits of evil humans, but others thought them to have been created specifically by the [[Celestial Bureaucracy]] to test humans and establish a balance between good and evil.{{Cite dragon/349/Ecology of the Ogre Mage|68-72}} or that oni were related to trolls. Other sages told the tale that oni were descended from the god [[Vaprak]]'s three sons, [[Anori]], [[Hakuni]], and [[Muaj]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends:
It was said that an island populated almost exclusively by oni was said to exist somewhere in the [[Celestial Sea]], but if true, no human explorer had ever found the island and returned. Strangely, the island was said to be guarded by thousands of one-foot tall black oni with powers as great as larger oni.

It was rumored that [[amethyst]]s could repel oni.
